name: vuejs.org dark theme
description: A dark theme for VueJs site
additional_info:
v0.2 dark theme for vuejs.org. Didn't see any out there yet, so thought I would give it a go. Works for all pages (mind your the blog is hosted on another site).

v.02 added 'code' and '#demo li' for better visibility

v.03 added class .hljs next to .line for better visibility of plain text in code blocks
